AlreadyExistsException
 
ApplicationStart
This class handles the birth and death of the connection pool.
CalculateCustomPartsList
This servlet's purpose is to load in values from partslist generator page and calculate the partslist-price based on what is most optimal for the customer's specifications.
CancelOrder
This servlet's purpose is to cancel an order and change its status, so it is not handled by employees unnecessarily

This servlet's purpose is to delete an item from the catalog.

This servlet's purpose is to populate an iframe with data from the pole catalog in the databse.

This servlet's purpose is to populate an iframe with data from the rafter catalog in the databse.
CatalogRoofFrame
This servlet's purpose is to populate an iframe with data from the roof catalog in the databse.
CatalogSaveItem
This servlet's purpose is to save a catalog item.
ChangeCustomerInfo
This servlet's purpose is to validate and change the customer's information and then show them back to the userpage with the changes made.
ChangeEmployeeInfo
This servlet's purpose is to let the employee change their infoformation from their profilesite.
ConnectionPool
 
CreateCustomer
This servlet's purpose is to create a customer and forward the customer to the customerSite.jsp page if the account was created successfully
CreateOrderRequest

DetailedOrderInfo
This servlet loads in a specific order from the database using an ID forwarded by the jsp and shows a more detailed view showing all information regarding said order.

This servlet's purpose is to let employees query the website for specific orders.
Employee
 
EmployeeClaimOrder
This servlet's purpose is to let the employee claim an order.
EmployeeFacade
 
EmployeeMakeOffer
This servlet's purpose is let an employee make an offer to a customer's order by changing the priceOffer field in the database and updating the order's status.
EmployeeMapper
 
GenerateCustomPartsList
This servlet's purpose is to redirect the employee to the generateCustomPartsList.jsp page if forwarded via "GET" and to forward a certain order to the generateCustomPartsList.jsp page if forwarded via "POST".
GenerateSCAD
This servlet's purpose is to generate a zip file containing the 3D models of the parts in the partslist.

OrderPartsListFrame
This servlet's purpose is to forward the employee to the orderPartsListFrame.jsp page with a partslist-attribute taken from requestscope and re-added to requestscope.
OrderStatus
 
OverrideCarportOrder
This servlet's purpose is to take in the parameters from the "edit order" form inside the partlist generator and update the order with the new values, which are then displayed on the detailed order info page.

PartsListToPDF

SeeAllOrders
This servlet's purpose is to load in all the orders that are present in the database into an arraylist and then redirects the employee to the seeAllOrders.jsp page.
SeeCustomerOrders
This servlet's purpose is to forward the customer to the seeCustomerOrders.jsp page and show all the orders the user has previously made.
SeeEmployeeOrders
This servlet's purpose is to load in all the orders that the employee is assigned to.
